content.rendered:
Directed by Leena Yadav

Written by Vivek Anchalia. Vivek Anchalia. Manu Rishi Chadha. Manu Rishi Chadha. Leena Yadav

Cast Rishi Kapoor (Raj Mathur). Amyra Dastur (Seher / Tara). Sheeba Chaddha (Sapna). Aparshakti Khurana (Baljeet Singh Chautala). Mukesh Chhabra (Anoop Ji). Diksha Juneja (Paro). Nirmal Rishi (Beeji / Bebe). Manu Rishi Chadha (Mittal). Brijendra Kala (Dr. Dheela). Mahesh Balraj (Lighter Man). Anirudh Tanwar (Kabir Mathur). Jeetu Shastri (Anees (as Jeetendra Shastri)). Gulab Singh Tanwar (Seher’s Father). Harish Khanna (Kuljeet Singh Ahluwalia). Raja Hasan (Jacky Jam). Chirag Khatri (Seher’s Boyfriend). Akash Dabas (Sanju). Vimi Mehta (Hostel Warden). Akarshak Sharma (Fantu / Percussionist).Shailesh Shankar Kulkarni. Yuvraj Sachdev (Baljeet’s Friend 1). Kripanshu Dutt (Ghannu/Saxophone Player)

Language Hindi

Producers Priya Agrawal. Aseem Bajaj. Antara Banerjee. Naved Farooqui. Ravi Sarin. Swati Shetty. Gulab Singh Tanwar. Leena Yadav

Production Saarthi
